title: Death.Track.Resurrection.Repack-R.G.Origami
description:
Death.Track.Resurrection.Repack-R.G.Origami

March 31, 2009 
Genre: Arcade / Racing (Cars) / 3D 
Developer: SkyFallen Entertainment 
Language: English / Russian 
Language: English / Russian 
Publication Type: Lossless RePack 
Crack: enclosing 
Platform: PC

System Requirements 
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD Athlon 64 processor with a clock frequency of 1.8 GHz 
Memory: 1GB 
Video: class NVIDIA  GeForce  6600 +, ATI  Radeon  9700 + or higher with 256 MB memory, compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free space on hard disk: 2,4 Gb

Description 

Death Track: Revival" - racing thriller, continuing the tradition of the legendary Deathtrack, 
became in time one of the pioneers of the genre sombat racing.

Action Ã‚Â«Death Track: Revival" occurs in the near future. In the world of anarchy and ruin. 
People long ago bored usual sports, to fashion a much more aggressive and exciting ways of 
leisure. Important people in the world is riveted to the main event of the entertainment 
industry - "race to the bottom" world tour of the ruins of the largest cities of the Earth. 
Powerful cars, bright and fierce fight, chase and shooting, in which well-known pilots, 
world fame, and of course money attracts more and more new riders.

Protagonist of the game - an aspiring pilot who first enters the competition at this level. 
On the way to the worldwide fame and popularity he will win many races, a lot of enemies 
to destroy and witness extraordinary craftiness inherent vorotilam show business.

Features 

Hazardous race with weapons, mines, military robots. 
10 cities: Bangkok, Vatican City, London, Moscow, New York, Paris, Prague, San Diego, Istanbul and Tokyo. 
Several types of races, some 100 km of tracks. 
10 powerful cars with a possibility of tuning. 
Performance figures of aerobatics and stunts.

Do not cut / no recoded 
Game Version - 1.2 
Installation time ~ 7 minutes
